gurmukhi: ੨ ਗੁਰ ਸਿੱਖੀ
translation: Discipleship of the Guru

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖੀ ਬਾਰੀਕ ਹੈ ਸਿਲ ਚਟਣ ਫਿਕੀ
transliteration: Gur Sikhee Baareek Hai Sil Chatanu Dhikee.
translation: To be disciple of the Guru is very subtle activity and it is like licking of the tasteless stone.

gurmukhi: ਤਿਖੀ ਖੰਡੇ ਧਾਰ ਹੈ ੳੁਹ ਵਾਲਹੁਂ ਨਿਕੀ
transliteration: Trikhee Khanday Dhaar Hai Uhu Vaalahu Nikee.
translation: It is thinner than the hair and sharper than the edge of the sword.

gurmukhi: ਭੂਹ ਭਵਿਖ ਨ ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਸਰਿ ਮਿਕਣਿ ਮਿਕੀ
transliteration: Bhooh Bhavikh N Varatamaan Sari Mikani Mikee.
translation: Nothing is equal to it in present, past and future.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਤੀਅਾ ਨਾਸਤਿ ੲੇਤੁ ਘਰਿ ਹੋੲਿ ੲਿਕਾ ੲਿਕੀ
transliteration: Douteeaa Naasati Aytu Ghari Hoi Ikaa Ikee.
translation: In the house of Sikhism, the duality gets erased and one becomes one with that One.

gurmukhi: ਦੂਅਾ ਤੀਅਾ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਸਣ ਕਕਾ ਕਿਕੀ
transliteration: Dooaa Teeaa Veesarai Sanu Kakaa Kikee.
translation: Man forgets the idea of second, third, when and why.

gurmukhi: ਸਭੈ ਸਿਕਾਂ ਪਰਹਰੈ ਸੁਖੁ ੲਿਕਤੁ ਸਿਕੀ ||੨||
transliteration: Sabhai Sikaan Paraharai Soukhu Ikatu Sikee ?2?
translation: Repudiating all the desires, the individual gets delight in the hope of one Lord.

gurmukhi: ੩ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਤਾੲੀ
translation: The way of Gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗੁ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਹਿਤਕਾਰੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Maaragu Aakheeai Guramati Hitakaaree.
translation: The way leading to the adoption of beneficent wisdom of the Guru (Gurmat) is known as the Gurmukh-way.

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮਿ ਰਜਾੲੀ ਚਲਣਾ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਵੀਚਾਰੀ
transliteration: Houkami Rajaaee Chalanaa Gur Sabad Veechaaree.
translation: In it one is taught to live in the will of the Lord and to ponder upon the Word of Guru.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾਵੈ ਖਸਮ ਕਾ ਨਿਹਚੳੁ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੀ
transliteration: Bhaanaa Bhaavai Khasam Kaa Nihachau Nirankaaree.
translation: The will of the Master comes to be loved and in all thoughts permeates the formless Lord.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਸਕ ਮੁਸਕ ਮਹਕਾਰ ਹੈ ਹੁੲਿ ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰੀ
transliteration: Isak Mousak Mahakaaru Hai Hui Paraoupakaaree.
translation: As love and fragrance do not remain hidden, the Gurmukh also does not remain concealed and gets himself busy in altruistic activities.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਦਕ ਸਬੂਰੀ ਸਾਬਤੇ ਮਸਤੀ ਹੁਸੀਅਾਰੀ
transliteration: Sidak Sabooree Saabatay Masatee Houseeaaree.
translation: He imbibes in him the faith, contentment, ecstasy, and the qualities of being skilful.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਜਿਣਿ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਮਾਰੀ ||੩||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Aapu Gavaaiaa Jini Haoumai Maaree ?3?
translation: Gurmukh decimates ego and conquers it.

gurmukhi: ੪ ਸਿੱਖ ਦੀ ਕਰਨੀ
translation: Conduct of a Sikh

gurmukhi: ਭਾੲਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਚਲਣਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਾਹੁਣਿਚਾਰੀ
transliteration: Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Chalanaa Hoi Paahounichaaree.
translation: Considering himself a guest, the sikh spends his life in loving devotion.

gurmukhi: ਚਲਣੁ ਜਾਣਿ ਅਜਾਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਗਹੁ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰੀ
transliteration: Chalanu Jaani Ajaanu Hoi Gahu Garabu Nivaaree.
translation: They (Sikhs) remain unknown to deceit and pull out ego from their minds.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਨਿਤ ਪਰਾਹੁਣੇ ੲਿਹ ਕਰਣੀ ਸਾਰੀ
transliteration: Gurasikh Nit Paraahounay Ayhu Karanee Saaree.
translation: Their true conduct is to treat themselves as guests in this world.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੇਵ ਕਮਾਵਣੀ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੂ ਪਿਅਾਰੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sayv Kamaavanee Satiguroo Piaaree.
translation: The object of the Gurmukh is service and only such action is loved by the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਰਵਾਰ ਸੁਧਾਰੀ
transliteration: Sabadi Surati Liv Leen Hoi Paravaar Sudhaaree.
translation: Merging consciousness in the Word they reform the whole family (in the form of world).

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਸਹਜ ਘਰਿ ਨਿਰਮਲਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੀ ||੪||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Jaai Sahaj Ghari Niramali Nirankaaree ?4?
translation: Through holy congregation they become pure and formless and get established in the final stage of equipoise.

gurmukhi: ੫ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਦੀ ਅਾਤਮ ਖੇਡ
translation: The spiritual sport of the gursikh

gurmukhi: ਪਰਮ ਜੋਤਿ ਪਰਗਾਸੁ ਕਰਿ ੳੁਨਮਨਿ ਲਿਵਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Param Joti Paragaasu Kari Ounamani Liv Laaee.
translation: Kindling the supreme light in his mind a gurmukh remains absorbed in the state of supreme trance.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਮ ਤਤੁ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਨਹਦਿ ਧੁਨਿ ਵਾੲੀ
transliteration: Param Tatu Paravaanu Kari Anahadi Dhouni Vaaee.
translation: When he adopts the supreme reality (Lord) in his mind, the unstruck melody starts ringing.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਮਾਰਥ ਪਰਬੋਧ ਕਰਿ ਪਰਮਾਤਮ ਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Paramaarad Parabodh Kari Paramaatam Haaee.
translation: Becoming conscious for altruism now resides in his heart the sense of God’s omnipresence.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਅਵੇਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਨਭੳੁ ਪਦ ਪਾੲੀ
transliteration: Gur Oupadaysu Avaysu Kari Anabhau Padu Paaee.
translation: Inspired by the teachings of the Guru, gurmukh attains the state of fearlessness.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧਨਾ ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਧਿਅਾੲੀ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Kari Saadhanaa Ik Mani Iku Dhiaaee.
translation: Disciplining himself in the company in the holy ones i.e. losing his ego, he remembers Lord with single-minded devotion.

gurmukhi: ਵੀਹ ੲਿਕੀਹ ਚੜ੍ਹਾੳੁ ਚੜ੍ਹਿ ੲਿੳੁਂ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਜਾੲੀ ||੫||
transliteration: Veeh Ikeeh Charhhaau Charhhi Ioun Nij Ghari Jaaee ?5?
translation: This way, entering from this world into the spiritual world, he finally establishes himself in his real nature.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਨਿਜ ਸਰੂਪਕ ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਵ੍ਰਯਾਪਕਤਾ ਦਾ ਅਨਭੈ
translation: Realization of the all-pervasiveness of the wondrous Guru

gurmukhi: ਦਰਪਣਿ ਵਾਂਗਿ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਰਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਅਾਪ ਨਿਹਾਲੈ
transliteration: Darapani Vaang Dhiaanu Dhari Aapu Aap Nihaalai.
translation: As is the reflection in the mirror.  He sees in the world His ownself.

gurmukhi: ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਹੈ ਚੰਦੁ ਜਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਭਾਲੈ
transliteration: Ghati Ghati Pooran Brahamu Hai Chandu Jal Vichi Bhaalai.
translation: That perfect Lord is there in all the selves; the ignorant individual searches Him outside as the moon sees its own reflection in the water and feels it is there.

gurmukhi: ਗੋਰਸੁ ਗਾੲੀ ਵੇਖਦਾ ਘਿੳੁ ਦੁਧ ਵਿਚਾਲੈ
transliteration: Gorasu Gaaee Vaykhadaa Ghiu Dudhu Vichaalai.
translation: Lord Himself is there in the milk, cow and ghee.

gurmukhi: ਫੁਲਾਂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਾਸੁ ਲੈ ਫਲੁ ਸਾੳੁ ਸਮ੍ਹਾਲੈ
transliteration: Phulaan Andari Vaasu Lai Phalu Saau Samhaalai.
translation: Taking fragrance from the flowers He Himself is the flavour in them.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਸਟਿ ਅਗਨਿ ਚਲਿਤੁ ਵੇਖਿ ਜਲ ਧਰਤਿ ਹਿਅਾਲੈ
transliteration: Kaasati Agani Chalitu Vaykhi Jal Dharati Hiaalai.
translation: His own phenomenon is there in wood, fire, water, earth and snow.

gurmukhi: ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਪੂਰਨੁ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਹੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵੇਖਾਲੈ ||੬||
transliteration: Ghati Ghati Pooranu Brahamu Hai Guramoukhi Vaykhaalai ?6?
translation: The perfect Lord resides in all the selves and is visualised by a rare gurmukh.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਅੈਸੇ ਸਿੱਖ ਦੀ ਰਹਿਣੀ
translation: Conduct of a Sikh of the Guru

gurmukhi: ਦਿਬ ਦਿਸਟਿ ਗੁਰ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਰਿ ਸਿਖ ਵਿਰਲਾ ਕੋੲੀ
transliteration: Dib Disati Gur Dhiaanu Dhari Sikh Viralaa Koee.
translation: Rare is the gurmukh  who concentrates upon the Guru and attains the divine sight.

gurmukhi: ਰਤਨ ਪਾਰਖੂ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੈ ਰਤਨਾ ਅਵਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Ratan Paarakhoo Hoi Kai Ratanaa Avaloee.
translation: He is the jeweller having the capacity of testing as well as keeping the jewels in the from of virtues.

gurmukhi: ਮਨੁ ਮਾਣਕੁ ਨਿਰਮੋਲਕਾ ਸਤਿਸੰਗਿ ਪਰੋੲੀ
transliteration: Manu Maanaku Niramolakaa Satisangi Paroee.
translation: His mind becomes pure like ruby and he remains absorbed in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਰਤਨਮਾਲ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਜਗਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਗੁਣ ਗੋੲੀ
transliteration: Ratanamaal Gurasikh Jagi Guramati Goun Goee.
translation: His mind becomes pure like ruby and he remains absorbed in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਵਦਿਅਾਂ ਮਰਿ ਅਮਰੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੁਖ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮੋੲੀ
transliteration: Jeevadiaan Mari Amaru Hoi Soukh Sahaji Samoee.
translation: He is dead while being alive i.e. he turns his face from evil propensities.

gurmukhi: ਓਤਿ ਪੋਤਿ ਜੋਤੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਜਾਣੋੲੀ ||੭||
transliteration: Aotipoti Jotee Joti Mili Jaanai Jaanoee ?7?
translation: Totally merging himself in the supreme light he understands his self as well as the Lord.

gurmukhi: ੮ ਅੈਸਾ ਸਿੱਖ ਗੁਰੂ ਨਾਲ ਅਭੇਦ
translation: Indenticalness of the Sikh with the Guru

gurmukhi: ਰਾਗ ਨਾਦ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਗੁਣ ਗਹਿਰ ਗੰਭੀਰਾ
transliteration: Raag Naad Visamaadu Hoi Goun Gahir Ganbheeraa.
translation: Elated in the music and sound (of the word), the disciple of the Guru becomes full of serene qualities.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਧੁਨਿ ਧੀਰਾ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Leen Hoi Anahadi Dhouni Dheeraa.
translation: His consciousness gets merged into the Word and his mind stabilizes in the unstruck melody.

gurmukhi: ਜੰਤ੍ਰ੍ਰੀ ਜੰਤ੍ਰ੍ਰ ਵਜਾੲਿਦਾ ਮਨਿ ੳੁਨਮਨਿ ਚੀਰਾ
transliteration: Jantree Jantr Vajaaidaa Manni Ounimani Cheeraa.
translation: The Guru plays upon the instrument of sermon, listening to which the mind dones clothes of the highest state of equipoise (to dance before the Lord).

gurmukhi: ਵਜਿ ਵਜਾੲਿ ਸਮਾੲਿ ਲੈ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਵਜੀਰਾ
transliteration: Vaji Vajaai Samaai Lai Gur Sabad Vajeeraa.
translation: The Sikh of the Guru, getting attuned to the instrument of teaching ultimately turns out himself to be a player of the Guru Word.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਤਰਿਜਾਮੀ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਅੰਤਰਿਗਤਿ ਪੀਰਾ
transliteration: Antarijaamee Jaaneeai Antarigati Peeraa.
translation: Now the omniscient Lord understands his pangs of separation.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਬੇਧਿ ਹੀਰੈ ਹੀਰਾ ||੮||
transliteration: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Baydhi Heerai Heeraa ?8?
translation: The disciple transforms into Guru and the guru into disciple in the same manner, as the diamond cutter in fact is also a diamond.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਤਥਾਚ
translation: Indenticalness of the Sikh with the Guru

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸੁ ਹੋੲਿਅਾ ਪਾਰਸਹੁਂ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵਡਿਅਾੲੀ
transliteration: Paarasu Hoiaa Paarasahu Guramoukhi Vadiaaee.
translation: The greatness of the gurmukh is that he being the philosopher’s stone makes every one a philosopher’s stone.

gurmukhi: ਹੀਰੈ ਹੀਰਾ ਬੇਧਿਅਾ ਜੋਤੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਮਿਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Heerai Heeraa Baydhiaa Jotee Joti Milaaee.
translation: As the diamond is cut by the diamond, the light of the gurmukh merges in Supreme Light.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਲੀਣੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਜੰਤ੍ਰ ਜੰਤ੍ਰ੍ਰੀ ਵਾੲੀ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Leenu Hoi Jantr Jantree Vaaee.
translation: His consciousness is attuned to the Word as the mind of the player absorbs in the instrument.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਪਰਚਾ ਪਰਚਾੲੀ
transliteration: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Parachaa Parachaaee.
translation: Now the disciple and the Guru become identical.  They become one and merge in one another.

gurmukhi: ਪੁਰਖਹੁੰ ਪੁਰਖੁ ੳੁਪਾੲਿਅਾ ਪੁਰਖੋਤਮ ਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Purakhahoun Purakhu Oupaaiaa Purakhotam Haaee.
translation: From man was born man (from Guru Nanak to Guru Angad) and he became the superior man.

gurmukhi: ਵੀਹ ੲਿਕੀਹ ੳੁਲੰਘਿ ਕੈ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾੲੀ ||੮||
transliteration: Veeh Ikeeh Ulaghi Kai Hoi Sahaji Samaaee ?9?
translation: Crossing the world with one jump he merged in the innate knowledge.

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤ ਸਚਖੰਡ
translation: Holy congregation, abode the truth -

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰੂ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਦੇਖਦੋ ਪਰਮਾਤਮੁ ਦੇਖੈ
transliteration: Satiguru Darasanu Daykhado Paramaatamu Daykhai.
translation: He who beholds the true Guru has beholden the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਅੰਤਰਿਗਤਿ ਲੇਖੈ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Leen Hoi Antarigati Laykhai.
translation: Putting his consciousness into the Word he concentrates upon his self.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਵਲ ਦੀ ਵਾਸਨਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਚੰਦਨ ਭੇਖੈ
transliteration: Charan Kaval Dee Vaasanaa Hoi Chandan Bhaykhai.
translation: Enjoying the fragrance of the lotus feet of the Guru he transforms himself into sandal.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣੋਦਕ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਰਸ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਵਿਸੇਖੈ
transliteration: Charanodak Makarand Ras Visamaadu Visaykhai.
translation: Tasting the nectar of the lotus feet he goes into a special wondrous state (of super consciousness).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਚਿਤੁ ਕਰਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਰੂਪ ਨ ਰੇਖੈ
transliteration: Guramati Nihachalu Chitu Kari Vichi Roop N Raykhai.
translation: Now in consonance with the Gurmat, the wisdom of the Guru, he stabilizing the mind goes beyond the boundaries of forms and figures.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਲਖ ਅਲੇਖੈ ||੧੦||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sach Khandi Jaai Hoi Alakh Alaykhai ?10?
translation: Reaching the holy congregation, the abode of truth, he himself becomes like that imperceptible and ineffable Lord

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਸਾਖੀ ਅਵਸਥਾ
translation: Witness state

gurmukhi: ਅਖੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਦੇਖਦਾ ਦਰਸਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਦਿਸੈ
transliteration: Akhee Andari Daykhadaa Darasan Vichi Disai.
translation: He who sees from inside the eyes, is in fact beholden outside also.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਸੁਰਤੀ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਿਸੈ
transliteration: Sabadai Vichi Vakhaaneeai Suratee Vichi Risai.
translation: He is described through words and He is illumined in the consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਵਾਸਨਾ ਮਨੁ ਭਵਰੁ ਸਲਿਸੈ
transliteration: Charan Kaval Vichi Vaasanaa Manu Bhavaru Salisai.
translation: For the fragrance of the lotus feet of the Guru, the mind, becoming the black bee, enjoys the pleasure.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸੰਜੋਗੁ ਮਿਲਿ ਵਿਜੋਗਿ ਨ ਕਿਸੈ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sanjogu Mili Vijogi N Kisai.
translation: Whatever is attained in the holy congregation, he gets not away from it.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਚਿਤੁ ਹੈ ਚਿਤੁ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਜਿਸੈ
transliteration: Guramati Andari Chitu Hai Chitu Guramati Jisai.
translation: By putting the mind into the teachings of the Guru, the mind itself changes according to the wisdom of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਣ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੂ ਹੈ ਤਿਸੈ ||੧੧||
transliteration: Paarabraham Pooran Brahamu Satigur Hai Tisai ?11?
translation: The true Guru is the form of that transcendental Brahm who is beyond all the qualities.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ੲੀਸ਼੍ਵਰੀਯ ਗੁਣ
translation: Godly Virtues

gurmukhi: ਅਖੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਦਿਸਟਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਕਿ ਸਾਹੁ ਸੰਜੋੲੀ
transliteration: Akhee Andari Disati Hoi Naki Saahu Sanjoee.
translation: He is sight in the eyes and breath in the nostril.

gurmukhi: ਕੰਨਾਂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਜੀਭ ਸਾਦੁ ਸਮੋੲੀ
transliteration: Kannaan Andari Surati Hoi Jeebh Saadu Samoee.
translation: He is consciousness in the ears and taste in the tongue.

gurmukhi: ਹਥੀ ਕਿਰਤਿ ਕਮਾਵਣੀ ਪੈਰ ਪੰਥੁ ਸਥੋੲੀ
transliteration: Hadee Kirati Kamaavanee Pair Pandu Sadoee.
translation: With hands He works and becomes fellow traveller on the path.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ ਮਤਿ ਸਬਦਿ ਵਿਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paaiaa Mati Sabadi Viloee.
translation: The gurmukh has attained the fruit of delight after churning the Word with consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਕਿਰਤੀ ਹੂੰ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵਿਰਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Parakiratee Hoo Baaharaa Guramoukhi Viraloee.
translation: Any rare gurmukh remains away from the effects of maya.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਚੰਨਣ ਬਿਰਖੁ ਮਿਲਿ ਚੰਨਣ ਹੋੲੀ ||੧੨||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Channan Birakhu Mili Channanu Hoee ?12?
translation: The holy congregation is a sandal tree to which whosoever becomes sandal

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ
translation: Wahiguru mantar

gurmukhi: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਦੀ ਕਿੳੁ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲੇ
transliteration: Abigat Gati Abigat Dee Kiu Alakhu Lakhaaay.
translation: How is the dynamism of the Unmanifest known?

gurmukhi: ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਹੈ ਅਕਥ ਦੀ ਕਿੳੁ ਅਾਖਿ ਸੁਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Akad Kadaa Hai Akad Dee Kiu Aakhi Sounaaay.
translation: How can the story of that ineffable Lord be told?

gurmukhi: ਅਚਰਜ ਨੋ ਅਾਚਰਜ ਹੈ ਹੈਰਾਣ ਕਰਾੲੇ
transliteration: Acharaj No Aacharaju Hai Hairaan Karaaay.
translation: He is wonderful for the wonder itself.

gurmukhi: ਵਿਸਮਾਦੇ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਹੈ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਸਮਾੲੇ
transliteration: Visamaaday Visamaadu Hai Visamaadu Samaaay.
translation: The absorbents in the wondrous realization get themselves elated.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਦੁ ਨ ਜਾਣੈ ਭੇਦੁ ਕਿਹੁ ਸੇਸਨਾਗੁ ਨ ਪਾੲੇ
transliteration: Vaydu N Jaanai Bhaydu Kihu Saysanaagu N Paaay.
translation: The Vedas also do not understand this mystery and even the Sesanag (mythological snake having thousand hoods) cannot know its limits.

gurmukhi: ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਸਾਲਾਹਣਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦ ਅਲਾੲੇ ||੧੩||
transliteration: Vaahiguroo Saalaahanaa Guru Sabadu Alaaay ?13?
translation: Vahiguru, God, is eulogised through recitation of the Word of the Guru, Gurbani.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਗੁਣ
translation: Virtues in a Gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਲੀਹਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਚਲੀਅੈ ਜਿੳੁ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹੁ
transliteration: Leehaa Andari Chaleeai Jiu Gaadee Raahu.
translation: As, a coach on the highway goes through the beaten tracks,

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮਿ ਰਜਾੲੀ ਚਲਣਾ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਨਿਬਾਹੁ
transliteration: Houkami Rajaaee Chalanaa Saadhasangi Nibaahu.
translation: In the holy congregation one goes on abiding with the divine ordinance (hukam) and will of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਧਨ ਸੋਘਾ ਰਖਦਾ ਘਰਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਾਹੁ
transliteration: Jiu Dhan Soghaa Rakhadaa Ghari Andari Saahu.
translation: As, the wise person keeps money intact at home

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਮਿਰਜਾਦ ਨ ਛਡੲੀ ਸਾੲਿਰੁ ਅਸਗਾਹੁ
transliteration: Jiu Mirajaad N Chhadaee Saairu Asagaahu.
translation: And the deep ocean leaves not its general nature;

gurmukhi: ਲਤਾ ਹੇਠਿ ਲਤਾੜੀਅੈ ਅਜਰਾਵਰ ਘਾਹੁ
transliteration: Lataa Haytdi Lataarheeai Ajaraavaru Ghaahu.
translation: As the grass is trampled under the feet,

gurmukhi: ਧਰਮਸਾਲ ਹੈ ਮਾਨਸਰ ਹੰਸ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਵਾਹੁ
transliteration: Dharamasaal Hai Maanasaru Hans Gurasikh Vaahu.
translation: Like this (earth) inn is the Manasarovar and the disciples of the Guru are swans

gurmukhi: ਰਤਨ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਕਰਿ ਕੀਰਤਨੁ ਖਾਹੁ ||੧੪||
transliteration: Ratan Padaarad Gur Sabadu Kari Keeratanu Khaahu ?14?
translation: Who in the form of kirtan, singing of the holy hymns, eat the pearls of the Word of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ਚੰਨਣਾਦਿ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of sandal

gurmukhi: ਚੰਨਣੁ ਜਿੳੁ ਵਣਖੰਡ ਵਿਚਿ ਓਹੁ ਅਾਪੁ ਲੁਕਾੲੇ
transliteration: Chananu Jiu Van Khand Vichi Aohu Aapu Loukaaay.
translation: As the sandal tree tries to conceal itself in the forest (but cannot remain hidden),

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸੁ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਪਰਬਤਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਗੁਪਤ ਵਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Paarasu Andari Parabataan Hoi Goupat Valaaay.
translation: The philosopher’s stone being identical with ordinary stones in the mountains spends its time in hiding.

gurmukhi: ਸਤ ਸਮੁੰਦੀ ਮਾਨਸਰੁ ਨਹਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲੇ
transliteration: Sat Samoundee Maanasaru Nahi Alakhu Lakhaaay.
translation: The seven seas are manifest but the Manasarovar remains invisible to common eyes.

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਪਰਛਿੰਨਾ ਪਾਰਜਾਤ ਨਹਿ ਪਰਗਟੀ ਅਾੲੇ
transliteration: Jiu Parachhinnaa Paarajaatu Nahi Paragatee Aaay.
translation: As parijat, wish fulfilling tree, also keeps itself unseen;

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਜਗਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਕਾਮਧੇਨੁ ਨਹਿ ਅਾਪ ਜਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Jiu Jagi Andir Kaamadhaynu Nahi Aapu Janaaay.
translation: Kamaddhenu, wish fulfilling cow, also lives in this world but never makes itself noticed.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਦਾ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਲੈ ਕਿੳੁ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲੇ ||
transliteration: Satigur Daa Oupadaysu Lai Kiu Aapu Ganaaay ?15?
translation: Likewise why should they who have adopted the teachings of the true Guru, include themselves in any count.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ, ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ
translation: Guru disciple, disciple Guru ,

gurmukhi: ਦੁੲਿ ਦੁੲਿ ਅਖੀ ਅਾਖੀਅਨਿ ੲਿਕ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਦਿਸੈ
transliteration: Dui Dui Akhee Aakheeani Iku Darasanu Disai.
translation: The eyes are two but they behold the one (Lord).

gurmukhi: ਦੁੲਿ ਦੁੲਿ ਕੰਨ ਵਖਾਣੀਅਨਿ ੲਿਕ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸਲਿਸੈ
transliteration: Dui Dui Kanni Vakhaaneeani Ik Surati Salisai.
translation: The ears are two but they bring out the one consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਦੁੲਿ ਦੁੲਿ ਨਦੀ ਕਿਨਾਰਿਅਾਂ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਤਿਸੈ
transliteration: Dui Dui Nadee Kinaariaan Paaraavaaru N Tisai.
translation: The river has two banks but they are one through the connection of water and are not separate.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਜੋਤਿ ਦੁੲਿ ਮੂਰਤੀ ੲਿਕ ਸਬਦ ਸਰਿਸੈ
transliteration: Ik Joti Dui Mooratee Ik Sabadu Sarisai.
translation: The Guru and the disciple are two identities but one shabad, Word permeates through both of them.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਸਮਝਾੲੇ ਕਿਸੈ ||੧੬||
transliteration: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Samajhaaay Kisai ?16?
translation: When the Guru is disciple and the disciple Guru, who can make the other understand.

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਗੁਰੂ ਚੇਲੇ ਦਾ ਕੰਮ
translation: Activity of the disciple Guru

gurmukhi: ਪਹਿਲੇ ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਦੇ ਸਿਖ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾੲੇ
transliteration: Pahilay Guri Oupadays Day Sikh Pairee Paaay.
translation: First the Guru making the disciple sit near his feet preaches to him.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਧਰਮਸਾਲ ਸਿਖ ਸੇਵਾ ਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Kari Dharamasaal Sikh Sayvaa Laaay.
translation: Telling him about the distinction of the holy congregation and the abode of dharma, he is put into the service (of the mankind).

gurmukhi: ਭਾੲਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਸੇਵਦੇ ਗੁਰਪੁਰਬ ਕਰਾੲੇ
transliteration: Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Sayvaday Gurapurab Karaaay.
translation: Serving through loving devotion, the servants of the Lord celebrate the anniversaries.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਕੀਰਤਨੁ ਸਚਿ ਮੇਲਿ ਮਿਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Keeratanu Sachi Mayli Malaaay.
translation: Attuning the consciousness with the Word, through the singing of hymns, one meets the truth.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗੁ ਸਚ ਦਾ ਸਚੁ ਪਾਰ ਲੰਘਾੲੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Maaragu Sach Daa Sachu Paari Laghaaay.
translation: The Gurmukh walks the path of Truth; practicing Truth he crosses the Worldly ocean.

gurmukhi: ਸਚਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਸਚਿਅਾਰ ਨੋ ਮਿਲਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲੇ ||੧੭||
transliteration: Sachi Milai Sachiaar No Mili Aapu Gavaaay ?17?
translation: Thus the truthful one obtains the truth and getting it, the ego is erased.

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਚਰਨਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਨਿੰਮ੍ਰਤਾ ਦਾ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ਼
translation: Learning humility from feet

gurmukhi: ਸਿਰ ੳੁਚਾ ਨੀਵੇ ਚਰਣ ਸਿਰਿ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾਂਦੇ
transliteration: Sir Ouchaa Neevayn Charan Siri Pairee Paanday.
translation: The head is high and the feet are at a low level but still the head bows upon the feet.

gurmukhi: ਮੁਹੁ ਅਖੀ ਨਕ ਕੰਨ ਹਥ ਦੇਹ ਭਾਰ ੳੁਚਾਂਦੇ
transliteration: Muhu Akhee Naku Kann Had Dayh Bhaar Ouchaanday.
translation: The feet carry the burden of mouth, eyes, nose, ears, hands and the whole body.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਚਿਹਨ ਛਡਿ ਪੂਜੀਅਨਿ ਕੳੁਣੁ ਕਰਮ ਕਮਾਂਦੇ
transliteration: Sabh Chihan Chhadi Poojeeani Kaounu Karam Kamaanday.
translation: Then, leaving aside all the body organs, only they (feet) are worshipped.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਸਰਣੀ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤੀ ਨਿਤ ਚਲਿ ਚਲਿ ਜਾਂਦੇ
transliteration: Gur Saranee Saadhasangatee Nit Chali Chali Jaanday.
translation: They daily go to the holy congregation in the shelter of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਵਤਨਿ ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਨੋ ਕਰਿ ਪਾਰਿ ਵਸਾਂਦੇ
transliteration: Vatani Paraoupakaar No Kari Paari Vasaanday.
translation: Then they run for the altruistic works and accomplish the work to the maximum possible.

gurmukhi: ਮੇਰੀ ਖਲਹੁੰ ਮੌਜੜੇ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਹੰਢਾਂਦੇ
transliteration: Mayree Khalahu Maujarhay Gurasikh Handdhaanday.
translation: Alas! Were it so that shoes made of my skin were used by the Sikhs of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਮਸਤਕ ਲਗੇ ਸਾਧ ਰੇਣੁ ਵਡਭਾਗ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੇ ||੧੮||
transliteration: Masatak Lagay Saadh Raynu Vadabhaagi Jinhaan Day ?18?
translation: Whosoever gets the dust of the feet of such people (with above virtues) he is fortunate and a blessed one.

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਧਰਤੀ ਤੋਂ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ਼
translation: Learning from the earth

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਧਰਤੀ ਧੀਰਜ ਧਰਮਸਾਲ ਮਸਕੀਨੀ ਮੂੜੀ
transliteration: Jiu Dharatee Dheeraj Dharamu Masakeenee Moorhee.
translation: As the earth is embodiment of continence, dharma and humility,

gurmukhi: ਸਭਦੂੰ ਨੀਵੀਂ ਹੋੲਿ ਰਹੀ ਤਿਸ ਮਣੀ ਨ ਕੂੜੀ
transliteration: Sabhadoon Neeveen Hoi Rahee Tis Manee N Koorhee.
translation: It remains under the feet and this humility is true and not false.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਹਰਿਮੰਦਰੁ ਕਰੈ ਕੋ ਕਰੈ ਅਰੂੜੀ
transliteration: Koee Harimandaru Karai Ko Karai Aroorhee.
translation: Somebody constructs temple of god on it and some gather rubbish heaps on it.

gurmukhi: ਜੇਹਾ ਬੀਜੈ ਸੋ ਲੁਣੈ ਫਲ ਅੰਬ ਲਸੂੜੀ
transliteration: Jayhaa Beejai So Lounai Phal Anb Lasoorhee.
translation: Whatever is sowed is got accordingly whether is be a mango or lasuri, a glutinous fruit.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਵਦਿਅਾਂ ਮਰਿ ਜੀਵਣਾ ਜੁੜਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜੂੜੀ
transliteration: Jeevadiaan Mari Jeevanaa Jurhi Guramoukhi Joorhee.
translation: While being dead in life i.e. deleting ego from the self, the gurmukhs  join gurmukhs in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਲਤਾਂ ਹੇਠਿ ਲਤਾੜੀਅੈ ਗਤਿ ਸਾਧਾਂ ਧੂੜੀ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Lataan Haytdi Lataarheeai Gati Saadhaan Dhoorhee ?19?
translation: They become the dust of the feet of the holy men, which is trampled under the feet.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਜਲ ਤੋਂ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ਼
translation: Learning from water

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਨਿਵਿ ਚਲਦਾ ਨੀਵਾਣਿ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Jiu Paanee Nivi Chaladaa Neevaani Chalaaiaa.
translation: As water flows downwards and takes with it whosoever meets it (and makes it also humble),

gurmukhi: ਸਭਨਾ ਰੰਗਾਂ ਨੋ ਮਿਲੈ ਰਲਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਰਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sabhanaa Rangaan No Milai Rali Jaai Ralaaiaa.
translation: All the dyes mix up in water and it becomes one with every colour;

gurmukhi: ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਕਮਾਵਦਾ ੳੁਨਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paraoupakaar Kamaanvadaa Ouni Aapu Gavaaiaa.
translation: Erasing ego it does altruistic deeds;

gurmukhi: ਕਾਠੁ ਨ ਡੋਬੈ ਪਾਲਿ ਕੈ ਸੰਗਿ ਲੋਹੁ ਤਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kaatdu N Dobai Paali Kai Sangi Lohu Taraaiaa.
translation: It does not sink the wood, it rather makes the iron swim with it;

gurmukhi: ਵੁਠੇ ਮੀਹ ਸੁਕਾਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਰਸ ਕਸ ੳੁਪਜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Voutday Meeh Soukaalu Hoi Ras Kas Oupajaaiaa.
translation: It makes for prosperity when it rains in rainy season.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਵਦਿਅਾ ਮਰਿ ਸਾਧ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਫਲਿਓ ਜਗਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ ||੨੦||
transliteration: Jeevadiaa Mari Saadh Hoi Saphaliao Jagi Aaiaa ?20?
translation: Likewise, the holy saints getting dead in life i.e. removing their ego, making their coming to the world fruitful.

gurmukhi: ੨੧ ਬ੍ਰਿੱਛ ਤੋਂ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ਼
translation: Learning from tree

gurmukhi: ਸਿਰ ਤਲਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਜੰਮਿਅਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਚਲੁ ਨ ਚਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sir Talavaaiaa Janmiaa Hoi Achalu N Chaliaa.
translation: With feet upward and head down, the tree gets rooted and stands unmoved.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਣੀ ਪਾਲਾ ਧੁਪ ਸਹਿ ੳੁਹ ਤਪਹੁ ਨ ਟਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paanee Paalaa Dhoup Sahi Uh Tapahu N Taliaa.
translation: It bears with water, cold and sunshine but does not turn its face from self-mortification.

gurmukhi: ਸਫਲਿਓ ਬਿਰਖ ਸੁਹਾਵੜਾ ਫਲ ਸੁਫਲੁ ਸੁਫਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Saphaliao Birakh Suhaavarhaa Phal Suphalu Suphaliaa.
translation: Such a tree is blessed one and becomes full of fruit.

gurmukhi: ਫਲ ਦੇੲਿ ਵੱਟ ਵਗਾੲਿਅੈ ਕਰਵਤਿ ਨ ਹਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Phalu Dayi Vat Vagaaiai Karavati N Haliaa.
translation: On stoning, it gives fruit and does not stir even under the sawing machine.

gurmukhi: ਬੁਰੇ ਕਰਨਿ ਬੁਰਿਅਾੲੀਅਾ ਭਲਿਅਾੲੀ ਭਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Buray Karani Buriaaeeaan Bhaliaaee Bhaliaa.
translation: The wicked go on doing evil deeds whereas the gentle remain busy in good activities.

gurmukhi: ਅਵਗੁਣ ਕੀਤੇ ਗੁਣ ਕਰਨਿ ਜਗਿ ਸਾਧ ਵਿਰਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Avagoun Keetay Goun Karani Jagi Saadh Viraliaa.
translation: Rare are the people in world who with their saintly heart do good to the evil.

gurmukhi: ਅੳੁਸਰਿ ਅਾਪ ਛਲਾੲਿਂਦਾ ਤਿਨਾ ਅੳੁਸਰੁ ਛਲਿਅਾ ||੨੧||
transliteration: Aousari Aap Chhalaainday Tinhaan Aousaru Chhaliaa ?21?
translation: The commoners are duped by time i.e. they change according to the time, but the holy men succeed in deluding the time i.e. they remain free from the influence of time.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨ ਦੇਖਤ ਹੀ ਸੁਧਿ ਕੀ ਨ ਸੁਧਿ ਰਹੀ ਬੁਧਿ ਕੀ ਨ ਬੁਧਿ ਰਹੀ ਮਤਿ ਮੈ ਨ ਮਤਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Darasan Daykhat Hee Sudhi Kee N Sudhi Rahee , Budhi Kee N Budhi Rahee Mati Mai N Mati Hai ?
translation: A glimpse of (Satguru) left me bereft of all my consciousness, senses, intelligence, cleverness and all other considered wisdom of the world.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮੈ ਨ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਅੳੁ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਮੈ ਨ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਰਹਿਓ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਮੈ ਨ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਰਹਿਓ ਗਤਿ ਮੈ ਨ ਗਤਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Surati Mai N Surati Au Dhiaan Mai N Dhiaanu Rahiao , Giaan Mai N Giaan Rahiao Gati Mai N Gati Hai ?
translation: I lost my awareness, attachment of mind with insignificant matters, desires to acquire base or futile ego inflating knowledge and other worldly predicaments.

gurmukhi: ਧੀਰਜੁ ਕੋ ਧੀਰਜੁ ਗਰਬ ਕੋ ਗਰਬੁ ਗੲਿਓ ਰਤਿ ਮੈ ਨ ਰਤਿ ਰਹੀ ਪਤਿ ਰਤਿ ਪਤਿ ਮੈ
transliteration: Dheeraju Ko Dheeraju Garab Ko Garabu Gaiao , Rati Mai N Rati Rahee Pati Rati Pati Mai ?
translation: My patience was lost and so was my vanity. There was no life in me and I was bereft of my existence even.

gurmukhi: ਅਦਭੁਤ ਪਰਮਦਭੁਤ ਬਿਸਮੈ ਬਿਸਮ ਅਸਚਰਜੈ ਅਸਚਰਜ ਅਤਿ ਅਤਿ ਹੈ ||੧||੯||
transliteration: Adabhout Paramadabhout Bisamai Bisama , Asacharajai Asacharaj Ati Ati Hai ?1?9?
translation: The glimpse of Satguru is capable of amazing one with wondrous feelings. These are astonishing and marvellous and there is no end to this amazement. (9)
